edu.byu.rpg.tools

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.byu.rpg.tools.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main asset loader for our game. Textures, maps, fonts, and audio will all be loaded here once, and can be retrieved throughout the game.

    • Field Summary

        public com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager manager

    • Constructor Detail

      • Assets

        public Assets()

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load()
        This method is called once at the beginning of the game to load all assets. It will block program execution until all assets have finished loading, so be sure to draw a loading/splash screen before calling this method.

      • loadTexture

        public void loadTexture(java.lang.String name)
        Subroutine of load(), used for loading images.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the PNG file (without path or extension).

      • getTexture

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture getTexture(java.lang.String name)
        Used to retrieve a pre-loaded Texture.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the image file (without path or extension).
        Returns:
        The pre-loaded Texture.

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap(java.lang.String name)
        Subroutine of load(), used for loading Tiled maps.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the TMX file (without path or extension).

      • getMap

        public com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap getMap(java.lang.String name)
        Used to retrieve a pre-loaded TMX map.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the map file (without path or extension).
        Returns:
        The pre-loaded map.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        This class disposes of all our loaded assets. It should be called within the `dispose()` function of our main game class, which is called automatically when the game window exits.
